name: Trump2020 - The Video Game
description:
The game draws on the Inferno - the first part of Dante's Divine Comedy to create a satirical sketch of our times. It is a unique intersection of games, art, and political commentary.

Like Dante, the player must navigate through the circles of Hell to the very deepest one of Treachery, where Trumps are frozen in ice and  must repeat the same statements forever.

The game aims to be funny, yet poignant and tragic.
